Package org.ginsim.common.xml

Class XMLHelper

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.xml.sax.helpers.DefaultHandler
      • org.ginsim.common.xml.XMLHelper
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    ContentHandler, DTDHandler, EntityResolver, ErrorHandler
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    GinmlParser, GsXMLHelper, PerturbationParser, SimulationParametersParser
    public abstract class XMLHelper
extends DefaultHandler
implements EntityResolver
    Base class for XML parsers. Implementors can define hooks to handle the relevant events generated by the SAX parser.
    Author:
    Aurelien Naldi

      • characters

        public void characters​(char[] ch,
                       int start,
                       int length)
                throws SAXException
        if curVal is not null, read characters will be appended there. a bit less work for other implementors, they just have to set curVal to null or "" when they need it.
        Specified by:
        characters in interface ContentHandler
        Overrides:
